snippet.title: STEINS;GATE ELITE Announcement Trailer (PS4/Nintendo Switch/Steam)
snippet.description:
From our partnership with MAGES. Inc., STEINS;GATE ELITE leaps onto the PS4, NINTENDO SWITCH, AND STEAM THIS 2018!

Official website: http://spike-chunsoft.com/SteinsGateElite/
Steam store page: 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/819030/STEINSGATE_ELITE/

Preorder now

PS4 - Amazon: https://tinyurl.com/yacjpo2r
PS4 - GameStop: https://tinyurl.com/y8zo9ww8
Switch - Amazon: https://tinyurl.com/yao7acy3
Switch - GameStop: https://tinyurl.com/y7v3fqju


KEY FEATURES

Fully Animated Adventure – Indulge in all the beautiful animation from 24 episodes of the STEINS;GATE anime.

A New Way to Time Leap – Experience the world of STEINS;GATE with this remastered, ultimate version that features newly animated sequences for certain endings.

Branching Storylines – Every choice you make has its own consequence, shifting the world line closer or farther from reaching 1% divergence, providing a multitude of animated endings.
